ctx: intros m x x' z Hmap.
case_eq (succ_dec m zero x); intro Hsucc_x.
case_eq (succ_dec m zero x'); intro Hsucc_x'.
specialize (cA1_Br1 m x x' z Hmap) as H1.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros m x x' z Hmap.
case_eq (succ_dec m zero x); intro Hsucc_x.
case_eq (succ_dec m zero x'); intro Hsucc_x'.
specialize (cA1_Br1 m x x' z Hmap) as H1.
specialize (cA0_Br1 m x x' z Hmap) as H0.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet *: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros m x x' z Hmap. unfold cA_1. unfold Br1. case_eq (succ_dec m zero x); intro Hsucc_x. * case_eq (succ_dec m zero x'); intro Hsucc_x'. + simpl. specialize (cA1_Br1 m x x' z Hmap) as H1. rewrite Hsucc_x, Hsucc_x' in H1. rewrite H1. reflexivity. + simpl. specialize (cA0_Br1 m x x' z Hmap) as H0. rewrite Hsucc_x, Hsucc_x' in H0. rewrite H0. reflexivity. * simpl. specialize (cA0_Br1 m x x' z Hmap) as H0. rewrite Hsucc_x in H0. rewrite H0. reflexivity.
